Hire Me

Sites and personal projects

2017 – Now
Founder & Instructor

Web Crash Course

My latest endeavour. Intensive web design and development workshops for beginners. WORK IN PROGRESS

Visit site
2017 – Now
Founder & Curator

City Designer

Site for curating information to help improve understanding of design challenges posed by a modern urban environment. The long-term ambition is to create a learning platform for engaging the public on how to design better cities for everyone, by everyone.

Visit site
2012 – 2015
Founder & Developer

Take Me To Denmark

I initially used the domain to get accepted to a university in Denmark. Now the site serves as a source of information for people who are interested in studying in Denmark. Frontpage uses various APIs to fetch weather, news and concerts from Denmark.

Visit site
2015
Research, Writing & Development

Information Design

An experiment in writing an academic paper using Markdown and generating a finished document using various Web technologies. The paper itself looks at the history of design approaches and examines up-and-coming fields of human-information interaction and information design. It takes methods from those fields and applies them to analyzing information needs in the context of travel.

Visit site

Work showcase

Holektiv

2016
http://holektiv.cz/

A minimalistic website for an artistic group Holektiv that does contemporary dance, mime, acrobatics and clownery. Some of the highlights include hero image gallery, video trailer popups, event calendar.

  • Tools:
  • SCSS
  • Gulp
  • jQuery
  • Flickity
  • Magnific Popup
  • moment.js

Bergs Potter

2015
http://bergspotter.com
  • wireframes

A homepage redesign for a company that imports hand-made pottery from Tuscany, Italy. The redesign focused on clean presentation and light tone in order to leave plenty of space for original images to pop. Some of the highlights include on-scroll animations, interactive store locator, Instagram widget.

  • Tools:
  • Wordpress
  • SCSS
  • Gulp
  • jQuery
  • Waypoints
  • Flickity

L'Non

2016
http://l-non.com
  • source code

A simple splash page with interactive particle background.

  • Tools:
  • SCSS
  • particles.js

Cover Letter

2015
http://iljapanic.github.io/showcase-letter/
  • source code

A throwback to the era of skeuomorphism. I used the site as a cover letter for a Design Educator position. The letter and other sensitive information has been replaced with placeholder content.

  • Tools:
  • SCSS
  • Gulp
  • classie

Agency One-Pager

2015
http://iljapanic.github.io/showcase-agency/
  • source code
  • Vimeo API code

A single-page agency site based on a design I did for a client. The focus is on clean presentation and subtle animations that gradually disclose the content. All the content has been replaced with placeholder texts and visuals.

  • Tools:
  • SCSS
  • Gulp
  • jQuery
  • Vide
  • Waypoints
  • Vimeo API

UndergroundUp

2014
https://urbancultures.github.io/undergroundup/
  • source code

A simple microsite for an original online video series looking at different underground artists in New York City.

  • Tools:
  • SCSS
  • jQuery
  • Waypoints
  • skrollr
  • Vimeo API
  • FitVid.js
  • Bourbon
